title: Why can I not customize the iOS and Android Splash Screen?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am unable to customize the Splash Screen when building to Android and iOS devices.

sections.title: Cause
content:
• The iOS Pro add-on is not attached to the serial number activated in your Unity Editor.
  • The Android Pro add-on is not attached to the serial number activated in your Unity Editor.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can now (as of June 28th 2016) purchase a new license with Android and iOS included on our Store site. For older licenses that have not yet been migrated to the new licensing plan, please see below.

sections.title: More Information
content: The custom Splash Screen is the only Engine feature that the Unity 5 Personal Edition does not support.
